Name:
Anthony
Zerstörer 1
Fate:
Transferred to West Germany, 17 January 1958
Sunk as a target, 16 May 1979
Range: 6,500 nmi (12,000 km; 7,500 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
As USS Anthony:
5 × 5 in (127 mm)/38 cal. guns
10 × 40 mm AA guns
7 × 20 mm AA guns
10 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
6 × depth charge projectors
2 × depth charge tracks
As Zerstörer 1:
4 × 5 in (127 mm)/38 cal. guns
6 × 3 in (76 mm)/50 cal. AA guns
5 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
2 x 21 in (533 mm) ASW torpedo tubes
2 × Hedgehog launchers
2 × depth charge tracks
